      • processEntry

        private void processEntry(SourceFeedEntry newEntry)
                   throws java.sql.SQLException,
                          java.lang.Exception
        adds a new entry to the database, tests it for fitting to all filters and adds matches to DB
        Parameters:
        newEntry - the entry to be processed
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - if an SQL query fails
        java.lang.Exception - if another error occurs
